description:
Check and monitor the health of your hard disks

Check and monitor the health of your disks to prevent data loss using
Self-Monitoring Analysis and Reporting Technology (S.M.A.R.T.). Detect bad
sectors on a disk surface by running Advanced Disk Scan. Instantly retrieve the
disk health information from the application running in the System Tray.

Perform scanning of disks for bad sectors to make sure your data is safe.
- Maintenance release
